VersionInfo.Title: Markdown Monster 3.5.22 is now available
VersionInfo.Detail:
This release adds a number of enhancements:
* Added support for .NET 8.0 * Image Generation AI via OpenAI * New GitHub Dark and updated GitHub Preview Themes * Updated Light Mode Application Theme * Many UI updates and workflow optimizations * Many new Markup Operations * Improved Multiline Markup Support * Weblog New Posts Folder for Drafts * Improved Html and PDF Exports * Save with Elevated Rights * plus [much more...](https://github.com/RickStrahl/MarkdownMonster/blob/main/Changelog.md)
